name: Last Hope on Earth
description:
Set in a desolate post-apocalyptic world, you are the Last Hope on Earth. Fight for the future of humanity with other players, or destroy them and become a cold-blooded killer looking for your own survival in a world full of dangers and infected.

In Last Hope on Earth, you are free to explore the open world, collect and search for resources, build your base, destroy infected and hunt other players. Everything is relevant for survival: the climate, the infected, the natural needs and also the other players.

What you should expect to find:


  • An open world full of resources to be collected.
  • Several places for you to build your base and become the highest hope.
  • Hungry infected with different levels of difficulty. Be careful when facing them!
  • A fun experience to play with your friends (or enemies).

In Last Hope on Earth you will find several game mechanics in the style of Open World Survival Craft and much more, such as: creating and building bases, searching for items, collecting resources, PvP in the open world, PvE against infected, cooperation and a lot of fighting for survival!
